name: Run'n'Gun (itch) (99lab)
description:
Description:

RUN ' N GUN is 2 player game where each one control one of the two characters 
that has the objective to shoot each other. The winner is the one who killed the enemy tree times first.

NOTE: YOU NEED TO HAVE TWO JOYSTICKS TO PLAY THIS GAME (and a friend).

How to Play:

Left Analog : move the player
Right Analog: Aim
RT and RB (R1 and R2): Shoot
LT and LB (L1 and L2): Use Ability 

Abilities:

The Bunny:
One shot per time, when pressed the button LT/LB can control the speed 
of the bullets making more quick or not whenever it wants

The Tanuki:
Four Shots per time, when spawned all the bullets moves very slowly
but if the button LT/LB is pressed all the bullets gain normal speed
